alert.note: Alert for Bering Strait Coast; Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills; Interior Seward Peninsula; Lower Yukon River; Southern Seward Peninsula Coast; St Lawrence Island; Yukon Delta Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 8:55PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Strong Winds and Blowing Snow Possible This Weekend... A storm system moving across the Bering Sea over the weekend will bring another round of gusty easterly to southeasterly winds to portions of the Yukon Delta and southern Seward Peninsula. Moisture associated with this system also has greater potential to bring a few inches of snow to the region. This, combined with gusty winds will likely produce another round of blowing snow and reduced visibilities over the weekend into early next week. While uncertainty remains in regards to track and intensity of the system, residents should prepare for difficult travel conditions over the weekend and stay up to date on the latest forecasts as details become more refined.

area.areaDesc: Bering Strait Coast; Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills; Interior Seward Peninsula; Lower Yukon River; Southern Seward Peninsula Coast; St Lawrence Island; Yukon Delta Coast
